entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries. Snow beginning late this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this afternoon. High minus 10. Wind chill near minus 20. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 12.
